PubRandCommit.description: `PubRandCommit` is a commitment to a series of public randomness. Currently, the commitment is a root of a Merkle tree that includes a series of public randomness values

commitment.description: Value of the commitment. Currently, it's the root of the Merkle tree constructed by the public randomness

epoch.description: The epoch number of Babylon when the commit was submitted

num_pub_rand.description: The amount of committed public randomness

start_height.description: The height of the first commitment
